Mike Pence said his bill would prevent any family planning funds under Title X from going to Planned Parenthood or other organizations that perform abortions. It will ensure that abortion providers are not being subsidized with federal tax dollars. California co-sponsors of Mike Pence 's bill include U.S. Reps.
